text:
Looking forward to test dnd in blog posts. It might solve a lot issues with clients demanding more flexibility with blog posts.

<@U7SL518D6> when do you expect this to be available for more folks?
Reminder: *Want to learn the latest tips and tricks for building on HubSpot?*  Check out our <https://developers.HubSpot.com/blog|Developer blog> for the latest.

My answer’s not going to be the answer you want to hear.

When it’s ready.
